createLSAid

public final LSAid createLSAid(URI id)
Description copied from interface: PrivilegedLSAFactory

Creates a new LSA-id, with a custom URI.

WARNING: In order to avoid id clashes the provided URI must be unique. The method createLSAid() should be preferred!

Specified by:
createLSAid in interface PrivilegedLSAFactory
Parameters:
id - A unique id
Returns:
A fresh, custom, LSA-id

createLSA

public final LSA createLSA(LSAid lsaId)
Description copied from interface: PrivilegedLSAFactory

Creates a new synthetic LSA instance.

WARNING: In order to avoid id clashes the provided LSA-id must be unique. The method createLSA() should be preferred!

Specified by:
createLSA in interface PrivilegedLSAFactory
Parameters:
lsaId - The LSA-id to be used
Returns:
A fresh, custom, LSA
